description: This file defines a React functional component 'ProjectDetailsModal' for rendering detailed information about a Jira project in a modal dialog. It manages state for project details, loading/error states, and issue type selection. It fetches project details via 'jiraApi' and displays various project attributes including description, lead, statistics, issue types, roles, and links to Jira. It also integrates a nested 'IssueTypeModal' component for issue type interactions.

methods.name: ProjectDetailsModal
methods.description: React component that renders detailed Jira project information in a modal overlay, including project metadata, stats, issue types, roles, and related modals for issue types.

methods.name: fetchProjectDetails
methods.description: Asynchronous function fetching project details from Jira API and updating component state, with error handling.

methods.name: getProjectUrl
methods.description: Generates the URL to open the project in Jira based on credentials and project key.

methods.name: getProjectTypeIcon
methods.description: Returns an emoji icon string based on the project type.
